patthana16.39:1.1: Micchattaniyataṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namicchattaniyato nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate terasa.
patthana16.39:2.1: Micchattaniyataṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasammattaniyato nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
